query:
UPDATE courses SET 
  title = 'Path II: FSL - Everyday Fluency',
  shortDescription = 'Crash Course in Everyday Workplace Interactions',
  price = 89900,
  originalPrice = 99900,
  totalDurationMinutes = 1800
WHERE id = 2;
